channel.title: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place
channel.description:
This is just a thread intended for the whole RS07 community to post what they're buying or selling! Here's a small list of rules that you need to abide by when buying or selling items on this thread.
[ol][li]You may not offer real life money for any items or gold in RS07. If someone still decides to offer real life money for any RS07 items or gold, your post will be reported and staff will deal with you as they feel.[/li] [li]You may only buy and sell [b]RS07[/b] items here! If anything EOC is posted here, your post will be reported and staff will deal with you as they feel.[/li] [li]You must use must clearly state that you are [b]Buying[/b] or [b]Selling[/b] in your post and you must clearly state the price you want for an item/ to pay for an item and what item you're actually selling or buying.[/li] [li]When you post your price, you post your price. To keep spam to a minimum, I ask you to please leave all negotiating to PM or ingame RS07.[/li] [li]Please keep arguing out of this thread. If you don't agree with a price or you think something is "INSANELY" over priced, let the poster know through PM so you and the poster can negotiate. Keeping spam to a minimum would be greatly appreciated![/li] [li]Leaving your RS07 username is not required, however it is recommended to way you want a buyer/seller to contact you.[/li] [li]Please make sure all of your posts are relevant to the thread's topic. All off topic posts will be reported to keep this thread clean and as user-friendly as possible. :D[/li] [li]All Global Forum rules apply to this thread also which can be found: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html]Here[/url].[/li][/ol]
If you do not know the current price of an item you're wanting to Buy or Sell, than check out the Mopar IRC. If you join the RS07 channel (#rs07) and type in "!average <item name>", the IRC will give you the average item value. However, if you want more accurate prices, its encouraged to go go west Varrock in trading worlds to find the actual street prices that people are using! :D
It is recommended, not required, to use this reformatted application for friendlier use. [code] IGN: Buy/sell: Amount: Price:[/code]
Here is an example of how the IRC works: [img]http://puu.sh/2mDGI[/img]
Edits are bound to happen on this thread, so make sure to check to see if its been updated every now and then. :P
[center][b][size=14pt]This thread is only for trading RS07 Items/Gold for RS07 Items/Gold.[/size][/b][/center]

item.title: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

IGN: The CDC
Buy: Magic logs + bow strings
Amount: Up to ~5k each
Price: 1.2k for logs, 120 ea for strings

I have around 4k magic longs to string and then I will be buying again. I’ll sell the longbows for 1430 ea if anyone is interested too.

Read full topic
item.source: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place

item.title: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

IGN: tinyash
Buy/sell: bow strings
Amount: 400+
Price: http://forums.zybez.net/pages/2007-price-guide?id=958

This thread needs to be more alive, regardless of communities that allow you to offer universally.

Read full topic
item.source: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place

item.title: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:509499”]Oh don’t worry, I couldn’t really care less what you think about me. The number of people’s opinions I care about here is slim and doesn’t consist of people like you. The thing about me is, I always speak my mind, even if it pisses some people off. I respect people that do the same, not those who blatantly lie to try and cover up how power hungry they are. I did it a bit less when I was a mod, but now that I’m not and don’t care about staying, I plan to point out as much as I can I can see. I’m a judgmental bastard, but it’s given me a pretty good eye for judging character. Go ahead and deny ‘sticky-fishing’, but the timing of your making this thread and of the other thread just does make it pretty obvious.

[tt]IGN: (PM me)
Buy/sell: {B} P Ess
Amount: 1k+
Price: http://forums.zybez.net/pages/2007-price-guide?id=3527 (average buy price in the last 24 hours)
[/tt][/quote]Thank for for posting something partially relevant to the thread topic. I will say that i did make this thread because of the other thread, but not for the intention of stick-fishing. I made it to make a thread with a so called “backbone” so people have rules to follow and a more organized place to communicate.

Read full topic
item.source: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place

Oh don’t worry, I couldn’t really care less what you think about me. The number of people’s opinions I care about here is slim and doesn’t consist of people like you. The thing about me is, I always speak my mind, even if it pisses some people off. I respect people that do the same, not those who blatantly lie to try and cover up how power hungry they are. I did it a bit less when I was a mod, but now that I’m not and don’t care about staying, I plan to point out as much as I can I can see. I’m a judgmental bastard, but it’s given me a pretty good eye for judging character. Go ahead and deny ‘sticky-fishing’, but the timing of your making this thread and of the other thread just does make it pretty obvious.

[tt]IGN: (PM me)
Buy/sell: {B} P Ess
Amount: 1k+
Price: http://forums.zybez.net/pages/2007-price-guide?id=3527 (average buy price in the last 24 hours)
[/tt]

Read full topic

item.title: Market Thread - Old school Community Market Place
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:509499”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=627743.msg4266081#msg4266081 date=1364069591]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=627743.msg4266079#msg4266079 date=1364069284]
if they’ve seen it before what is the purpose of this thread
[/quote]For the community to to communicate what they want to buy or sell. Again, make sure your post is relevant to this thread or don’t post.
[/quote][quote author=Ruby link=topic=627743.msg4266093#msg4266093 date=1364070475]

if they’ve seen it before what is the purpose of this thread

You don’t have to use it. Some people would like to use it so I don’t see what your problem is, it isn’t bothering you.
[/quote]I’m sorry, did I ever say that people couldn’t use this thread? I was just pointing out another marketplace, holy shit… you got all defensive saying everyone’s already seen it, for no reason… Least I’m not the one sticky-fishing.

My mistake I guess, I forgot you could only post buy/sell offers in one place or you would spontaneously combust.[/quote]Not sticky-fishing. I am trying to make a place for buyers and sellers to communicate. If you don’t want to partake in it, simply don’t post. Its as simple as that. I’m not the only member of this community who is tired of you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

People don’t have to be reported for not using the template, the point of it is to make it easier for people to buy or sell things, and if everyone posts in sentence form like Ruby did, then it takes a while for people to find what they want.

This is just a thread intended for the whole RS07 community to post what they’re buying or selling! Here’s a small list of rules that you need to abide by when buying or selling items on this thread.

[ol][li]You may not offer real life money for any items or gold in RS07. If someone still decides to offer real life money for any RS07 items or gold, your post will be reported and staff will deal with you as they feel.[/li]
[li]You may only buy and sell RS07 items here! If anything EOC is posted here, your post will be reported and staff will deal with you as they feel.[/li]
[li]You must use must clearly state that you are Buying or Selling in your post and you must clearly state the price you want for an item/ to pay for an item and what item you’re actually selling or buying.[/li]
[li]When you post your price, you post your price. To keep spam to a minimum, I ask you to please leave all negotiating to PM or ingame RS07.[/li]
[li]Please keep arguing out of this thread. If you don’t agree with a price or you think something is “INSANELY” over priced, let the poster know through PM so you and the poster can negotiate. Keeping spam to a minimum would be greatly appreciated![/li]
[li]Leaving your RS07 username is not required, however it is recommended to way you want a buyer/seller to contact you.[/li]
[li]Please make sure all of your posts are relevant to the thread’s topic. All off topic posts will be reported to keep this thread clean and as user-friendly as possible. :D[/li]
[li]All Global Forum rules apply to this thread also which can be found: Here.[/li][/ol]

If you do not know the current price of an item you’re wanting to Buy or Sell, than check out the Mopar IRC. If you join the RS07 channel (#rs07) and type in "!average ", the IRC will give you the average item value. However, if you want more accurate prices, its encouraged to go go west Varrock in trading worlds to find the actual street prices that people are using!

It is recommended, not required, to use this reformatted application for friendlier use.
